io.customerly

Interface Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss

  • Enclosing interface:
    Customerly.SurveyListener

    public static interface Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss
    Implement this interface to obtain async event of the disposing of a Survey Dialog started with Customerly.openSurvey(FragmentManager, SurveyListener.OnShow, SurveyListener.OnDismiss)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss.DismissMode
      Indicates the reason of the disposing of the Survey
      COMPLETED - survey closed without invalidation (tap out of alert) REJECTED - survey closed after that user completed it (user closed survey in "thank you message" step) POSTPONED - survey closed and reject (user closed survey before "thank you message" step)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COMPLETED 
      static int POSTPONED 
      static int REJECTED 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDismiss(int pDismissMode)
      Invoked when the Survey has been dismissed.

    • Field Detail

      • POSTPONED

        static final int POSTPONED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMPLETED

        static final int COMPLETED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REJECTED

        static final int REJECTED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onDismiss

        void onDismiss(int pDismissMode)
        Invoked when the Survey has been dismissed.
        Parameters:
        pDismissMode - Indicate the state of the dismissed survey. POSTPONED for a Survey just dismissed but still pending and available for a next openSurvey, COMPLETED for a completed Survey and REJECTED for a rejected Survey
